name: Giraffe growth chart
description: Looking for a gift that the little one won’t outgrow overnight?! Our giraffe growth charts are the perfect gift. These cute and whimsical growth charts are a fun way to track the little one’s height progression. Click here to see available colors for background fabric. Additionally, we provide 12 height markers to make it easy for you to mark the height! Each height marker is 2"W X 1.5"H and made with cardstock paper so that you can write the height and age of the child. 3/4" bar pin adhered behind each marker for secure fastening to growth chart. (NOTE: Pins are not to be handled by children under seven years of age). Dimensions are approximately 14”W X 53”L and hung on a 16” wooden dowel. While design will be the same, fabric color may vary based on availability.

name: Raffey graspers (family)
description: Inspired by one of my son’s favorite stuffed animals (a giraffe named Raffey), these Raffey graspers are the perfect toy for babies of all ages. Our graspers come in three different sizes – baby, mama, and papa (a.k.a. S/M/L) – to make sure there’s a perfect fit as your little one grows! They’re perfect for traveling and fit nicely in a diaper bag or purse. This listing is for a family of 3 (baby, mama and papa). Click here to see available colors for fabric. Each grasper has two fabric patterns for front/back. Each grasper is made from 100% cotton and ribbon and stuffed with premium fiber cluster. Eyes, ears and mouth hand-sewn with 100% cotton embroidery floss. Measurements (approximate): Baby – 7” tall X 1.5” wide Mama – 9” tall X 1.75” wide Papa– 10” tall X 1.75” wide

name: Sk8er booties
description: Our sk8er booties are the perfect way to express your baby’s ‘tude and a sure fire way for your baby to stand out from the crowd. Go with classic black or red, or spice things up with a splash of hot blue, orange, yellow, pink, or green! Click here to see available colors. Handmade using 100% cotton yarn, they are soft and durable, sure to keep baby's feet warm and comfortable. Laces are adjustable and need to be tied. embe recommends double knotting the laces to secure them. Sizes 3-9 months: sole - 4.5” height – 2.5” width – 2.25” Click here to see available colors.

name: Ballerina slippers
description: Your little girl may not know how to do a plie or an arabesque just yet, but she’ll look like the sweetest ballerina in our adorable ballerina slippers! Made from Cotton blend yarn, these crocheted slippers with satin ribbon ties are the perfect gift for any baby girl! Click here to see available colors. Ribbon will match the bootie color except for black which will have a white or pink ribbon. Choose from the following colors: Dark pink (azalea), light pink (berry), light blue and black. Sizes and measurements: 3-6 mo sole - 4” 6-12 sole - 4.5” Booties are made to order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for your item to be made before it is shipped.

name: Cushy letters
description: These unique letter hangings are perfect for personalizing any child’s room or door! Made from 100% cotton and with high loft batting, our cushy letters are versatile – you can hang each letter individually on your child’s bedroom wall, or attach them to ribbon for a wall/door hanging. You can also leave them as is and your child will learn their ABCs and/or how to spell their name in no time! Letters measure approximately 9” height X 7” width. Click here to see available colors. Note: when viewing your cart change the qty to the number of letters you want then during checkout with Paypal specify the letters in the "Add special message to merchant" box or email mary [at] embeshop.com with your letter selections.
